Customer agrees that Novocall Pte Ltd gathers anonymous information about the functioning of Novocall Pte Ltd Service for Customer.
Novocall Pte Ltd may process this information and publish the data for marketing purposes for current and prospective customers.
Once you decide to subscribe, we need you to provide your credit card details, number of Agents (operators) seats, and subscription period.

text: The Privacy Policy describes how we collect and handle any information gathered from users of the Services.
Once you decide to subscribe, we need you to provide your credit card details, number of Agents (operators) seats, and subscription period.
